posts.post_content: This should be reprinted in a Core with some Griffins. That is the sort of thing they should be doing over printing the same cards 8 cores in a row. Let's see Griffins, Insects, Warriors, Skeletons, and Drakes all get a shot in the next core set (just throwing some tribes out there. You don't have to pick them apart as to why those are particularly bad ideas, but they do exist and should get more love).

You don't have to pick them apart as to why those are particularly bad ideas, but they do exist and should get more love).

Posted By: The-Earth-Dragon (4/19/2012 11:38:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I remember getting the Mirage cardlist before the set came out and seeing this guy on there. I was sure this meant there would be more awesome griffin-related cards coming out. That even seemed to be the case when [Griffin Canyon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Griffin Canyon) came out in the following set. Then, nothing... well nothing worth playing at any rate. Certainly no other Griffin Lord like Zuberi here.  
  
For a race of mythical mash-up bad-asses, Griffins sure get the raw end of the deal. The most playable one is [Azorius First-Wing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Azorius First-Wing), and from there it goes downhill. How sad is that?
posts.html:
I remember getting the Mirage cardlist before the set came out and seeing this guy on there. I was sure this meant there would be more awesome griffin-related cards coming out. That even seemed to be the case when Griffin Canyon came out in the following set. Then, nothing... well nothing worth playing at any rate. Certainly no other Griffin Lord like Zuberi here.

For a race of mythical mash-up bad-asses, Griffins sure get the raw end of the deal. The most playable one is Azorius First-Wing, and from there it goes downhill. How sad is that?

Posted By: wholelottalove (11/5/2012 11:49:00 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Useful griffins:  
[Armored Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armored Griffin)  
[Azorius First-Wing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Azorius First-Wing)  
[Daraja Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Daraja Griffin)  
[Diving Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diving Griffin)  
[Griffin Protector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Griffin Protector)  
[Harrier Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harrier Griffin)  
[Mistmoon Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mistmoon Griffin)  
[Retaliator Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Retaliator Griffin )   
[Silverclaw Griffin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverclaw Griffin)  
Few of these cards are GREAT, but that, combined with Mothdust Changeling and Griffin Rider, you can totally make a good Griffin deck. Of course, Good, and "4-0 FMN hurr hurr" are never the same thing
